channel.title: Add new Commands to Server
channel.description: Im using Figmentscape 4.5 and i want to add new command. it has a text document that says "commands if u wanna add em" and they have the coding. but where do i put that coding. i cant find a file to put it in

item.title: Add new Commands to Server
item.dc:creator: @chrham_1997 chrham_1997
item.description:
@chrham_1997 wrote:

go on Client.java search for (“master”)
under master type:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("your command name") addItem(itemid, ammount) sendMessage("your message"); }

or

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("your command name") if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Chrham 2 } else { teleportToX = your coordinateX; teleportToY = your coordinateY; sendMessage("You teleport to your place"); }
If you need more, ask ;)

Read full topic
